features: GLOWING RADIANCE. Unleash the potential of your skin with the HAYEJIN Blessing of Sprout Radiance glow toner. HAYEJIN's Signature Luminosity Capsules are soluble tiny beads infused with delicately balanced plant oils and natural-origin actives. These capsules instantly brighten your complexion while delivering deep soothing and moisturizing benefits to the skin.

BOTANICAL BOOST. Infused with natural Botanical Sprouts and Lotus Seed Germ extracts, this hydrating toner rejuvenates tired skin. Immerse yourself in the authentic experience of Korean skincare and revive the natural vitality of your skin.

DEEP HYDRATION. Battle dryness with our blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Sodium Hyaluronate. This face toner delivers intense hydration without any stickiness making it an essential part in the collection of Korean skin care products.

BRIGHTER APPEARANCE. Experience a revitalized complexion and enhanced radiance through the seamless harmony of skin-purifying Lotus Embryo Extract, paired with skin-replenishing Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaine, and Panthenol.

GENTLE VEGAN FORMULA. Our facial toner is suitable even for pregnant women while respecting your skin and the planet. Its vegan formula balances your skin's pH for an improved skincare routine. Experience the gentle touch of this skin toner a beloved part of Korean skincare.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is in the luminosity capsule? The tiny beads are called Luminosity Capsules, encapsulating hypoallergenic brightening and moisturizing actives including 60% of MCT oil. Upon application, they will melt away, imparting a dewy glow instantly. Can I layer it underneath makeup? Our buildable formula is perfect for layering up and down. Keep your foundation in place without losing moisture. What are the benefits of Lotus Embryo? Hayejin focused on the revitalizing properties prominent in Lotus Embryo. Full of vitality, it revives and clarifies your skin by inhibiting oxidation. How long is the shelf life? 12 months after initial use. Approximately 36 months from the manufacture date if sealed and kept in a cool place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product for all skin types. It is labeled as a toner but I found it to be more as an Essence. It has a thicker consistency and moisturizes the skin. Definitely a repurchase. For a 10 minute mask apply product to a thin cotton pad and adhere to face. Leave on for 10 to 15 minutes. Do not rinse and begin skin care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Quite literally stops my chest acne in its steps. Great for the face and chest, which is rare for toners! My redness is toned down over night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for Seven Skin Method!
reviews.reviewText: My skin has never looked so clear, so hydrated and luminous...even glassy. It is bouncy to the touch, and I swear, it is so glowy it must nearly be bioluminescent! And I'm pretty sure it's all thanks to Hayejin Blessing of Sprout Radiance Toner. I read about the Korean Seven Skin Method a few weeks ago and how it could give me that glowy skin we all want. Intrigued, I knew I needed to find just the right product to try it, and that's when I found Hayejin Blessing of Sprout Radiance Toner. In case you aren't familiar with the method, it is very easy to do. You just apply layer after layer after layer of one or more hydrating toner products or essences, lightly patting each layer into your skin before moving on to the next. This Hayejin toner/essence is PERFECT for the Seven Skin Method! This product is somewhat viscous, with a consistency just a little thicker than water. I prefer to pour a small amount into my palm, wet my fingers, then press them to my face, sort of pushing the essence into my skin. I wait 30 to 60 seconds between layers. I love everything about this stuff. It comes in a nice, heavy frosted glass bottle that looks and feels good in hand but isn't frilly or fussy. The scent is very light, but pleasant, and my skin drinks it up thirstily. This toner isn't cheap, but I have used products by other brands that cost a lot more and do a lot less. I will definitely repurchase this stuff, probably forever, and I will certainly be on the lookout for other products by Hayejin. I mean, seriously...if the TONER is this good, I can't even imagine how amazing the rest of the product line must be! Any more radiance and I'm pretty sure I'll glow in the dark!I get so excited about this toner that I very nearly forgot to mention one of my favorite things about it: Not only are all Hayejin products made from natural, botanical ingredients, they are also all vegan and completely cruelty-free! It truly is a brand that is beautiful inside and out. If you can afford this product, buy it now! It might just be the best thing you ever do for your skin. It is absolutely worth its price. It's one of the best beauty products I have EVER used, and I really think you will love it, too!I hope my experience with this product might help YOU make a more informed purchase. Happy shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 💞💝💝👍Love this Korean Toner well Prepare my Skins for other Skincare Products👍💞💞💝
reviews.reviewText: As I get past that much dreaded Middle Age, I have begun religiously practice good daily skincare regimen. This involves using quality skincare products from a facial cleanser, to eventually some sorts of anti-aging night cream or serum. Often, like many out there, I skimp on the toner for years in between these two; which is a big mistake. A good toner is an important step as it removes any last traces of dirt, grime and impurities stuck in our pores after we wash our face. When added to our daily skincare routine and used regularly, it can have major positive impact on the appearance and tightness of your pores (hello, aging skin).After cleansing, skincare should always be applied lightest to heaviest (with the exception of SPF which always comes last). So because of its water-like consistency, toner is meant to be applied immediately after cleanser and before serums, moisturizers, and oils.Why I Love this Toner?💞👍💞👍💞👍💞👍 This HAYEJIN Korea Blessing of Sprout Radiance Vitality Toner is made in Korea, pretty much the de facto Skincare Capital of Asia, is an amazing all-in-one toner that's not too heavy, and easy to apply to my skins after my facial cleansing step in preparation my skins for the subsequent anti-aging skincare products, so that my skins get the very best benefits from Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen often found in the night creams or serums around my eyes where wrinkles & fine lines popped up. This vegan radiance tiner capsules naturally absorb onto my face to give my skins the shining and hydrated skin texture that everyone is yearning for. Furthermore, I love that this toner uses all natural botanical sprouts, lotus seed germ extract and 10 types of fresh herbs supply vitality into fatigued skins. As many Asian women prefers a whiter facial complexion, you often see them shun sunlight but staying indoors or wear huge straw hats to shield their faces from the sun. This toner also includes askin bightening ingredient that transforms skin clearer and more transparent with the refreshing power of lotus seeds and sprouts. FINALLY, this tonerNaturally replenishes moisture without any sticky sensation for the fresh finish and quickly absorbed, I typically shy away from toners that are too heavy, this toner is the perfect consistency to lay the foundation for my premium night creams and serums.🙏🙏🙏If you enjoy this review please let me know 🤞🤞🤞👍💞💞👍 HIGHLY RECOMMENDED👍💞💝💝
